source_objects.title: Business Strategy
source_objects.description: Become a master strategist with courses on the following: business strategy, performance innovation, marketing strategy, customer loyalty and more.

items.title: Grow Your Business the Right Way
items.headline: How To Create The Right Strategy To Get Your Business To Where You Want It To Be
objectives_summary: Learn how to grow your business the right way with certainty and control and not hope and luck.
Establish the best route to take, be prepared for the hazards that may lie in wait and stay on course to make it happen.
Define where you want your business to be and create the right strategy that will get it there.

items.title: Writing an Awesome Business Plan for Success
items.headline: Learn how to write a business plan that will help you succeed in your business
objectives_summary: Learn how to write a business plan
Understand the different formats of a business plan
Basic structure of a business plan

items.title: Amazing customer service: how to impress clients and guests
items.headline: Service is not enough anymore, you need something much more powerful! Find out now what that is...
objectives_summary: You will be able to deliver topservice on a whole new level
You will feel much more confident to deliver great hospitality
You will be able to make a difference in the lives of your customers

items.title: Rapid Foresight For Business Strategy and Innovation
items.headline: Exploring the near plausible futures for growth
objectives_summary: Learn a systematic and sprint based approach to applying strategic foresight for near plausible future
Tools and techniques of strategic foresight to understand and leverage disruptive change for innovation
Ability to scan and identify trends, weak signals, and change drivers that are likely to impact the business operating environment

items.title: Build a Property Portfolio
items.headline: The 3 + 1 Strategy for Financial Freedom
objectives_summary: Implement a strategy using property as an investment vehicle to achieve financial freedom
Understand how property can have money work for them

items.title: Design Thinking | From Zero to HERO
items.headline: Learn how to unleash your power with disruptive ideas in less than 2 hours
objectives_summary: How to design products, services and processes following Design Thinking guideline to provide as much value as possible.
You will learn a new way of thinking boosting your and your team’s imagination.
Understand issues that are surrounding you from a customer perspective and market needs.

items.title: Aha! A Practical Guide to Have More Insight
items.headline: Rethinking the way we search for insight
objectives_summary: Develop more persuasive approaches to marketing communications and behavioral change
Become better investigators of problems, be it business or personal and solve them from a practical perspective
Develop a mindset for insight mining & Better understand and overcome barriers to insight mining

items.title: The Neuroscience Challenges of Organizational Change
items.headline: Organizational Psychology & Neuroscience Applied to Organizational Change Management
objectives_summary: Three neuroscience challenges to organizational change
The neurological process employees go through during change
Psychology and Neuroscience impacts of change on your employees

items.title: CIPS L4M5 Commercial Negotiation - Practice Papers
items.headline: Practice Tests based on questions in the real exam
objectives_summary: cips
procurement
supply

label.title: CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply
label.display_name: CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply

items.title: Game Theory: Strategic Thinking in Economics and Business
items.headline: Game Theory in economics and business: Nash Equilibrium | Prisoner's Dilemma | Game Trees | Rollback Equilibrium
objectives_summary: Game Theory
Decision Making
Economics

items.title: Strategic Business Process Management
items.headline: process driven organisation, business process re-engineering, control based process, measuring process etc.
objectives_summary: Learn about people driven organisation
Learn about process driven organisation
Understand going from people driven to process driven

items.title: Corp Finance #10 Cost of Capital–Debt & Equity Financing
items.headline: Learn weighted average cost of capital (WACC), debt financing, & equity financing from a Certified Public Accountant CPA
objectives_summary: Calculate weighted average cost of capital (WACC)
Calculate the cost of debt
Calculate the cost of preferred stock

items.title: Creating & Hosting Profitable Seminars, Events And Workshops
items.headline: How to attract people to your conferences and events that sell out generating huge profits
objectives_summary: Know and apply the 7 key elements needed to run a highly successful and profitable event
Know how to get your IDEAL customer in the room
Effectively price your event at the right level

items.headline: Preparation, Valuation & Checklists For Everything You Need To Transition

items.headline: A Comprehensive Guide on Breaking into the Modeling Industry and Building a Long-Lasting Career
objectives_summary: How to break into the modeling industry
How to get an agent
How to runway walk and how to pose

items.title: Entrepreneur's course to writing AWESOME business plan!

objectives_summary: Start looking for funding capital
